abstract: Grant Hill becomes vice chairman of Atlanta Hawks.
lead_paragraph: Hill was introduced as vice chairman of the Atlanta Hawks, one day after the franchise and arena rights were bought for $850 million.

headline.main: Grant Hill Becomes a Hawks Executive
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Hill Becomes a Hawks Executive

snippet: Hill was introduced as vice chairman of the Atlanta Hawks, one day after the franchise and arena rights were bought for $850 million.
